location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3145 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemball’s earlier letter (folio 25) relating to efforts to trace and punish a Muscat subject guilty of trading a Somali girl. Anderson requests that Kemball instruct the Native Agent at Muscat to report on the progress of the Sultan of Muscat Syud Soweynee’s [Thuwaynī bin Sa‘id al-Sa‘id] efforts to punish the man responsible, once he has returned to Muscat.
